result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Judgment of Dismissal/Acquittal signed and filed.
Defendant Hugo Rene Hernandez in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State moves to dismiss and read-in. Court grants.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 3, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Hugo Rene Hernandez in court with Attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Fragoso states he is not ready to proceed to plea and sentence as Defendant would like to obtain his driver's license so he can accept the state's offer.  Court adjourns.    Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Hugo Rene Hernandez
Current: C/O Waukesha County Jail, 515 W. Moreland Blvd., Waukesha, WI 53187   (Effective: 05-13-2015)
Prior: S98  W12932 Loomis Road, Muskego, WI 53150
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 26, 2015 at 09:30 am.
No new law violations. Not operate a motor vehicle with valid DL. Make all court appearances. No possession of illegal drugs. No possession of drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Hugo Rene Hernandez in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Criminal complaint addressed - reading waived.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED. Court sets cash bail at $150.00 with conditions. Court orders warrant quashed. Court will give another date for plea/sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 26, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
Bail/bond hearing on May 12, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
